name: Ichigo Kurosaki
subtitle: Substitute Soul Reaper
rules_text: If a 'Rukia Kuchiki' is on your field, this character gains +500 Reiatsu.
flavor_text: "It's not a question of whether I can or can't. I'm doing it because I have to."

name: Rukia Kuchiki
subtitle: Shinigami in a Gigai
rules_text: Exhaust: The next time a character would be destroyed this turn, it is not. Use this ability only once per turn.
flavor_text: "You fool! Do you have any idea what you've just done?"

name: Orihime Inoue
subtitle: Awakening Powers
rules_text: Exhaust: Prevent the next 1000 damage that would be dealt to target character this turn.
flavor_text: "If I were the rain... would I be able to bind two hearts together?"

name: Yasutora Sado (Chad)
subtitle: Gentle Giant
rules_text: This character must attack each turn if able.
flavor_text: "I fight for those I care for."

name: Uryū Ishida
subtitle: Pride of the Quincy
rules_text: Exhaust: Deal 500 damage to any target character. This damage cannot be prevented.
flavor_text: "I have sworn to never forgive Soul Reapers. That is my pride."

name: Kisuke Urahara
subtitle: Candy Shop Owner
rules_text: When this character enters the battlefield, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "I'm just a humble, handsome, businessman."

name: Kon
subtitle: Mod-Soul
rules_text: When this character is destroyed, you may return it to your hand.
flavor_text: "Bo-niiice!"

name: Basic Hollow
subtitle: Lost Soul
flavor_text: A soul twisted by regret, now driven by an insatiable hunger.

name: Zangetsu
subtitle: The Sleeping Zanpakuto
rules_text:
Equip only to 'Ichigo Kurosaki, Substitute Soul Reaper'.
Equipped character gains +800 Reiatsu.
flavor_text: A blade as large as its wielder's potential.

name: Soul-Purifying Rite (Konso)
rules_text:
Choose one:
- Draw a card.
- Remove a character with 1000 or less Genryu from an opponent's Soul Burial.
flavor_text: The duty of a Soul Reaper is to guide Plus souls to the Soul Society.

name: Santen Kesshun
subtitle: Sacred Three-Linked Shield
rules_text: Negate the next source of damage that would be dealt to you or a character you control.
flavor_text: "I reject it."

name: Quincy Pendant
rules_text:
Equip only to a Quincy character.
Equipped character's activated abilities cost 1 less to use.
flavor_text: A catalyst for gathering Reishi from the atmosphere.

name: Karakura Town
subtitle: World of the Living
rules_text: At the beginning of each player's turn, if they control a Human character, they gain 1 life.
flavor_text: A town with an unusually high concentration of spiritual energy.

name: Grand Fisher
subtitle: Hollow
rules_text: When this character destroys another character in combat, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: The hollow that killed Ichigo's mother.

name: Don Kanonji
subtitle: Spirit Medium
rules_text: When Don Kanonji enters the battlefield, target character cannot attack next turn.
flavor_text: "Spirits are always with you!"

name: Ichigo Kurosaki
subtitle: Ryoka Invader
rules_text: When this character enters the battlefield, search your deck for an Equipment card named 'Shikai - Zangetsu' and put it onto the battlefield attached to this character.
flavor_text: "The name is Ichigo Kurosaki. And I'm the one who's gonna beat you!"

name: Byakuya Kuchiki
subtitle: 6th Division Captain
rules_text:
Characters with Tier 1 cannot block this character.
Pay 2W: Return target character with cost 3 or less to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "The law is absolute. It forgives no one."

name: Renji Abarai
subtitle: 6th Division Lieutenant
rules_text: When this character attacks, it gains +500 Reiatsu until end of turn.
flavor_text: "I've decided. I'm going to surpass you, Byakuya Kuchiki."

name: Kenpachi Zaraki
subtitle: 11th Division Captain
rules_text:
This character's Reiatsu cannot be reduced.
This character must attack each turn if able.
flavor_text: "A battle is not a place for reasoning. It is a place for instinct."

name: Yoruichi Shihōin
subtitle: Flash Goddess
rules_text:
Flash Step
This character cannot be blocked except by characters with Flash Step.
flavor_text: "Looks like you need some help, Ichigo."

name: Sōsuke Aizen
subtitle: 5th Division Captain
rules_text: When this character enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. That player cannot play Technique cards during their next turn.
flavor_text: "Admiration is the furthest thing from understanding."

name: Shikai - Zangetsu
rules_text:
Equip only to 'Ichigo Kurosaki'.
Equipped character gains +1500 Reiatsu and 'Pay 1W: This character deals damage to a blocking character as if it were not blocked this turn.'
flavor_text: "Forget what you know. Forget what you think you know."

name: Hadō #4. Byakurai
subtitle: Pale Lightning
rules_text: Deal 1500 damage to target character.
flavor_text: A concentrated blast of spiritual energy.

name: Bakudō #61. Rikujōkōrō
subtitle: Six-Rod Light Restraint
rules_text: Target character cannot attack or block until your next turn.
flavor_text: An advanced binding spell that paralyzes the target.

name: Senka
subtitle: Flash Blossom
rules_text: Target attacking character you control cannot be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: A foot technique that combines a flash step with a direct attack.

name: Bankai - Tensa Zangetsu
rules_text:
You can only play this card by tributing an 'Ichigo Kurosaki' equipped with 'Shikai - Zangetsu'.
This character can attack the turn it enters the battlefield.
flavor_text: All of his power, condensed into a small, swift form.

name: Seireitei
subtitle: Court of Pure Souls
rules_text: All Soul Reaper characters gain +300 Reiatsu and +300 Genryu. The cost to play Soul Reaper characters is reduced by 1.
flavor_text: The heart of the Soul Society, protected by the Gotei 13.

name: Tōshirō Hitsugaya
subtitle: 10th Division Captain
rules_text: Exhaust: Target character cannot attack during its controller's next turn.
flavor_text: "I am not a child. I am a captain."

name: Shunsui Kyōraku
subtitle: 8th Division Captain
rules_text: When this character blocks, you may have it deal no combat damage and take no combat damage this turn.
flavor_text: "Fighting is never a thing to be enjoyed."

name: Jūshirō Ukitake
subtitle: 13th Division Captain
rules_text: Pay 2W: Change the target of a Technique card that targets a single character to another legal target.
flavor_text: "There are two types of fights. Fights to protect life, and fights to protect pride."

name: Mayuri Kurotsuchi
subtitle: 12th Division Captain
rules_text: When a character an opponent controls is destroyed, you may draw a card.
flavor_text: "Perfection is a bore. I strive for something beyond perfection."

name: Ichigo Kurosaki
subtitle: Hollowfied
rules_text:
You can only play this card by playing a Technique card named 'Hollow Mask'.
This character gains +2000 Reiatsu. At the end of your turn, destroy this character.
flavor_text: "I can't afford to lose!"

name: Ulquiorra Cifer
subtitle: 4th Espada
rules_text:
Hierro (This character takes 500 less damage from all sources).
Pay 2B: Destroy target character that was dealt damage by this character this turn.
flavor_text: "If this is what you call a 'heart', then it is the heart that causes you humans to suffer."

name: Grimmjow Jaegerjaquez
subtitle: 6th Espada
rules_text: This character can attack an additional time each turn.
flavor_text: "Don't forget my name, Soul Reaper, and you better pray you never hear it again!"

name: Coyote Starrk
subtitle: 1st Espada
rules_text: When this character attacks, you may pay 2B. If you do, deal 1000 damage to all characters your opponent controls.
flavor_text: "It's a sin to be alone."

name: Nelliel Tu Odelschwanck
subtitle: Former 3rd Espada
rules_text: When this character enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.
flavor_text: "Itsygo!"

name: Hollow Mask
rules_text: Play only if you control 'Ichigo Kurosaki'. Tribute that character, then play one 'Ichigo Kurosaki, Hollowfied' from your hand or deck.
flavor_text: The manifestation of an inner demon, granting immense but temporary power.

name: Cero
subtitle: Hollow Flash
rules_text: Can Only be used if you control a Arrancar. Deal 2000 damage to any target.
flavor_text: A powerful blast of concentrated spiritual energy.

name: Gran Rey Cero
subtitle: Royal Hollow Flash
rules_text: Play only if you control an Espada character. Deal 5000 damage to target character.
flavor_text: A cero forbidden in Las Noches, for it is powerful enough to distort space.

name: Resurrección: Murciélago
rules_text:
You can only play this card by tributing 'Ulquiorra Cifer'.
When this character enters the battlefield, destroy all Equipment on the field. This character can attack twice per turn.
flavor_text: "Imprision, Murciélago."

name: Hueco Mundo
subtitle: World of Hollows
rules_text: All Hollow and Arrancar characters gain +500 Reiatsu. At the beginning of each player's end step, if they control no Hollow or Arrancar characters, they lose 2 life.
flavor_text: A barren, eternal night.

name: Nnoitra Gilga
subtitle: 5th Espada
rules_text:
Hierro (This character takes 500 less damage from all sources).
This character takes no damage from characters with less Reiatsu.
flavor_text: "There's no salvation for the likes of us."

name: Szayelaporro Granz
subtitle: 8th Espada
rules_text: When this character enters the battlefield, look at your opponent's hand and choose a card. They discard that card.
flavor_text: "Perfection is what I seek."

name: Shinji Hirako
subtitle: Visored Captain
rules_text: When this character attacks, switch the Reiatsu and Genryu of the blocking character until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Things are more interesting when they're upside-down."

name: Ichigo Kurosaki
subtitle: Fullbring User
rules_text: When this character deals combat damage to a player, you may return an Equipment card from your Soul Burial to your hand.
flavor_text: "This power... It feels different."

name: Kugo Ginjo
subtitle: Leader of Xcution
rules_text: Pay 2G: Gain control of target Equipment card until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Welcome to Xcution."

name: Shukuro Tsukishima
subtitle: Book of the End
rules_text: When this character deals combat damage to a character, gain control of that character.
flavor_text: "Haven't you heard? I'm your oldest friend."

name: Riruka Dokugamine
subtitle: Dollhouse
rules_text: Pay 1G: Target character cannot be the target of opponent's abilities until your next turn.
flavor_text: "I love cute things!"

name: Ichigo Kurosaki
subtitle: True Zanpakutō
rules_text: When this character enters the battlefield, you may destroy one Field card. If you do, this character can attack this turn.
flavor_text: "I am Zangetsu."

name: Yhwach
subtitle: Father of the Quincy
rules_text:
This character is unaffected by your opponent's Technique cards.
At the start of your turn, you may look at the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck and place them back in any order.
flavor_text: "All for my sake. For the world I will create."

name: Genryūsai Yamamoto
subtitle: Captain-Commander
rules_text: Pay 3WW: Destroy all other characters on the field.
flavor_text: "Do not think that your brand of evil is the only one that exists."

name: Äs Nödt
subtitle: Sternritter 'F' - The Fear
rules_text: Characters that block or are blocked by this character cannot attack during their controller's next turn.
flavor_text: "There is nothing to fear... but fear itself."

name: Blut Vene
subtitle: Blood Vein
rules_text: Target Quincy character you control gains +2000 Genryu until end of turn.
flavor_text: The defensive form of Blut, reinforcing the user's durability.

name: Blut Arterie
subtitle: Blood Artery
rules_text: Target Quincy character you control gains +2000 Reiatsu until end of turn.
flavor_text: The offensive form of Blut, bolstering the user's attack power.

name: Wahrwelt
subtitle: The True World
rules_text: All Quincy characters gain +1000 Reiatsu. Non-Quincy characters cannot gain life.
flavor_text: The realm of the Quincy King, built upon the ruins of the Soul Palace.

name: Genryūsai Yamamoto
subtitle: Bankai: Zanka no Tachi
rules_text:
You can only play this card by tributing 'Genryusai Yamamoto'.
When this character enters the battlefield, destroy all other characters. At the beginning of your turn, each player loses 5 life.
flavor_text: " I am here. There is no greater security than that."
artwork_path: C:/Users/Daria/.cursor/Bleach Soul Deck/Images/characters/BBSChars/5/Thousand-Year Blood War/Shigekuni Genryusai Yamamoto (1562) [Power]/gacha.png

name: Jugram Haschwalth
subtitle: Sternritter 'B' - The Balance
rules_text: Once per turn, when a character you control would be destroyed, you may prevent that damage.
flavor_text: "I am the scales that measure the world."

name: Bazz-B
subtitle: Sternritter 'H' - The Heat
rules_text: Pay 1U: This character gains +1000 Reiatsu this turn. Activate only once per turn.
flavor_text: "Everything I have is for His Majesty's sake!"

name: Ichibē Hyōsube
subtitle: Monk of the Zero Division
rules_text: When this character deals damage to a character, you may change that character's name to 'Ant'. Characters named 'Ant' have 100 Reiatsu and 100 Genryu.
flavor_text: "I am the one who names all things."

name: Rukia Kuchiki
subtitle: Bankai: Hakka No Togame
rules_text:
You can only play this card by tributing 'Rukia Kuchiki'.
When this character enters the battlefield, all other characters cannot attack or block until your next turn.
flavor_text: "Bankai: Hakka no Togame."

name: Soul Reaper's Resolve
rules_text: Exhaust: Add one Red (W) energy to your pool.

name: Hollow's Hunger
rules_text: Exhaust: Add one Black (B) energy to your pool.

name: Quincy's Pride
rules_text: Exhaust: Add one Blue (U) energy to your pool.

name: Human's Potential
rules_text: Exhaust: Add one Gray (G) energy to your pool.

name: Ganju Shiba
subtitle: Sand Sorcerer
rules_text: When this character enters the battlefield, target character cannot block this turn.
flavor_text: "I am the self-proclaimed number one Soul Reaper hater in the western Rukongai."

name: Rangiku Matsumoto
subtitle: 10th Division Lieutenant
rules_text: When this character enters the battlefield, you may tap target character.
flavor_text: "There is no such thing as a perfect being."

name: Izuru Kira
subtitle: 3rd Division Lieutenant
rules_text: Whenever this character deals combat damage to a character, that character gets -1000 Reiatsu.
flavor_text: "A battle is a place of despair."

name: Momo Hinamori
subtitle: 5th Division Lieutenant
rules_text: If you control 'Sōsuke Aizen', this character gets +1000 Reiatsu.
flavor_text: "Captain Aizen..."

name: Shikai: Haineko
rules_text: Equip to 'Rangiku Matsumoto'. Equipped character gains 'Pay 1W: Deal 1000 damage to all blocking characters.'
flavor_text: "Growl, Haineko!"

name: Hadō #33. Sōkatsui
subtitle: Blue Fire, Crash Down
rules_text: Deal 1000 damage to up to two target characters.
flavor_text: A versatile and widely used offensive Kido.

name: Gin Ichimaru
subtitle: Former 3rd Division Captain
rules_text: Flash Step. Pay 2W: Destroy target character that has been dealt damage this turn.
flavor_text: "I am a snake"

name: Kaname Tōsen
subtitle: Justice Incarnate
rules_text: When this character attacks, defending player cannot play Technique cards this turn.
flavor_text: "The path of least bloodshed is the path of justice."

name: Ichigo Kurosaki
subtitle: Vasto Lorde
rules_text: Play only from your Soul Burial if an 'Ichigo Kurosaki' was destroyed this turn. Trample (Excess damage is dealt to opponent). At the end of your turn, you lose the game.

name: Ulquiorra Cifer
subtitle: Segunda Etapa
rules_text:
Play only by tributing 'Resurrección: Murciélago'.
Characters damaged by this character are destroyed at end of turn. Pay 3B: Your opponent loses 5 life.
flavor_text: "You are now beneath my feet. This is... despair."

name: Caja Negación
subtitle: Negation Box
rules_text: Remove target character from the game for 2 of its controller's turns.
flavor_text: An artifact used to punish subordinates by trapping them in a closed dimension.

name: Fullbring Restoration
rules_text: Tribute one 'Ichigo Kurosaki, Fullbring User'. Play one 'Ichigo Kurosaki, Ryoka Invader' from your Soul Burial.
flavor_text: "Your powers are not gone. They were simply taken. I shall return them to you."

name: Askin Nakk Le Vaar
subtitle: Sternritter 'D' - The Deathdealing
rules_text: When this character enters the battlefield, choose a card type. Opponents cannot play cards of that type.
flavor_text: "This is simply... lethal."
artwork_path: C:/Users/Daria/.cursor/Bleach Soul Deck/Images/characters/BBSChars/5/Thousand-Year Blood War/Askin Nakk Le Vaar (1720) [Speed]/gacha.png

name: Bambietta Basterbine
subtitle: Sternritter 'E' - The Explode
rules_text: When this character deals combat damage, destroy all Equipment on the field.
flavor_text: "Everything I touch becomes a bomb."

name: Kenpachi Zaraki
subtitle: Shikai Unleashed
rules_text:
Play by tributing 'Kenpachi Zaraki'.
This character can attack all of your opponent's characters once.
flavor_text: "Drink, Nozarashi."

name: Quincy: Vollständig
rules_text: Target Quincy character gains +2000 Reiatsu and +2000 Genryu and can attack this turn.
flavor_text: The ultimate form of the Quincy, stolen from the Bankai of Soul Reapers.

name: The Almighty
rules_text:
Play only if you control 'Yhwach'.
End the turn. Take an extra turn after this one.
flavor_text: "I have seen every future. Every single one."

name: Soul King Palace
subtitle: Royal Realm
rules_text: At the beginning of your turn, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.
flavor_text: The dimension of the Soul King, resting above the Seireitei.

name: Ikkaku Madarame
subtitle: 11th Division 3rd Seat
rules_text: If this character would be destroyed, you can discard a card instead.
flavor_text: "A real fight is one where both sides are willing to die."

name: Yumichika Ayasegawa
subtitle: 11th Division 5th Seat
rules_text: Pay 1W: Target character's abilities cannot be activated this turn.
flavor_text: "Beauty is all that matters."

name: Shikai - Hōzukimaru
rules_text: Equip to 'Ikkaku Madarame'. Equipped character gains +1000 Reiatsu and can attack an additional character each combat.
flavor_text: "Extend, Hōzukimaru!"

name: Aaroniero Arruruerie
subtitle: 9th Espada
rules_text: When this character enters the battlefield, you may put a character card from any Soul Burial onto the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text: "I am an army of one."

name: Zommari Rureaux
subtitle: 7th Espada
rules_text: Pay 2B: Gain control of target character until end of turn.
flavor_text: "All things are under my control."

name: Wonderweiss Margela
subtitle: Arrancar
rules_text: Opponent's card effects cannot reduce this character's Genryu.

name: Aizen's Betrayal
rules_text: Gain control of all Soul Reaper characters until end of turn. They gain the Arrancar faction in addition to their other factions.
flavor_text: "Since when were you under the impression that I wasn't using Kyōka Suigetsu?"

name: Jackie Tristan
subtitle: Dirty Boots
rules_text: The more damage this character has taken, the higher its Reiatsu. (+100 Reiatsu for every 100 damage taken).
flavor_text: "My boots get dirtier the more I fight."

name: Lille Barro
subtitle: Sternritter 'X' - The X-Axis
rules_text: This character's attacks cannot be blocked.
flavor_text: "My attacks pierce through anything and everything."

name: Gerard Valkyrie
subtitle: Sternritter 'M' - The Miracle
rules_text: If this character would be destroyed, instead, heal all damage from it and double its Reiatsu and Genryu.
flavor_text: "I am a miracle! To defeat me is to defeat miracles themselves!"

name: Ichigo Kurosaki
subtitle: Horn of Salvation
rules_text:
Play by tributing 'Ichigo Kurosaki, True Zanpakutō'.
This character has Trample and can attack two characters at once.
flavor_text: The culmination of all of his powers.

name: Bankai: Kannonbiraki Benihime Aratame
rules_text:
Play by tributing 'Kisuke Urahara'.
Pay 2W: Choose a keyword. This character gains that keyword until end of turn. Pay 3W: Destroy target character.
flavor_text: "Let's begin the restructuring."

name: Soi Fon
subtitle: 2nd Division Captain
rules_text: If this character deals damage to the same character twice in one turn, destroy that character.
flavor_text: "Whether you live or die is of no consequence to me."

name: Sajin Komamura
subtitle: 7th Division Captain
rules_text: When this character blocks, it gets +2000 Genryu until end of turn.
flavor_text: "He who does not fear the sword he holds is not worthy of holding a sword."

name: Final Getsuga Tenshō
rules_text: You can only play this card by tributing an 'Ichigo Kurosaki' with 5000 or more Reiatsu. You win the game.
flavor_text: "The final Getsuga Tenshō is for me to become Getsuga itself."
artwork_path: C:/Users/Daria/.cursor/Bleach Soul Deck/Images/characters/BBSChars/5/Premium/Ichigo Kurosaki (1349) [Heart] [4th Anniversary Final Getsugatensho version]/gacha.png

name: Barragan Louisenbairn
subtitle: 2nd Espada
rules_text: All other characters get -500/-500. Pay 3B: Destroy target Equipment.
flavor_text: "I am the king of Hueco Mundo."

name: Tier Harribel
subtitle: 3rd Espada
rules_text: When this character enters the battlefield, create three 1000/1000 Arrancar tokens.
flavor_text: "There is no sacrifice in battle."

name: Kyōka Suigetsu
subtitle: Mirror Flower, Water Moon
rules_text: Until your next turn, you decide how your opponent's characters attack and block.
flavor_text: The power of perfect hypnosis.

name: Pernida Parnkgjas
subtitle: Sternritter 'C' - The Compulsory
rules_text: When this character deals damage to a character, gain control of it.
flavor_text: "I am the left arm of the Soul King."

name: Gremmy Thoumeaux
subtitle: Sternritter 'V' - The Visionary
rules_text: Pay 3U: Create a copy of any character on the battlefield. It is a 'Vision' in addition to its other types.
flavor_text: "Imagination is the strongest power there is."

name: Ōetsu Nimaiya
subtitle: Creator of Zanpakutō
rules_text: This character deals double damage to characters with Equipment.
flavor_text: "There is no Zanpakutō in this world that I don't know."

name: Senjumaru Shutara
subtitle: Great Weave Guard
rules_text: When this character enters the battlefield, attach all Equipment cards from all graveyards to characters you control.
flavor_text: "I weave the very threads of fate."

name: Medallion's Plunder
rules_text: Gain control of target character with Bankai subtype.
flavor_text: A Quincy artifact designed to steal a Soul Reaper's ultimate power.
